Once upon a time, in a small town, there was a tall tree. Many kids loved to play near the tree. One day, a little boy named Tim wanted to climb the tall tree. His mom said, "Be careful, Tim. Promise me you will not go too high."
Tim started to climb the tree. He looked around and saw his friends playing below. He wanted to go higher, but he remembered his promise to his mom. So, he stopped and climbed back down.
